item.title: 稳定币发行商 Paxos 任命 Lim 为新加坡执行董事
item.description: Paxos Trust Co.任命Jeannie Lim为稳定币发行商Paxos Singapore的执行董事，Jeannie Lim最近的职务是新加坡Meta Platforms Inc.的消息支付主管。【原文：Paxos Trust Co. named Jeannie Lim, who was most recently head of messaging payments at Meta Platforms Inc. in Singapore, as the stablecoin issuer’s executive director at Paxos Singapore.】

item.title: BTG 称安第斯市场十年来风险回报最佳
item.description: BTG Pactual 表示，安第斯股票市场提供了十年来最好的风险回报，即使今年的表现远远超过巴西和墨西哥的股票市场。【原文：Andean equity markets offer the best risk-reward in a decade, even after outperforming their counterparts in Brazil and Mexico by a wide margin this year, said BTG Pactual.】

item.title: 阿拉米达支持的矿商创世数字资产公司考虑在美国上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，随着加密货币行业的复苏步伐加快，Genesis Digital Assets 正在考虑在美国进行首次公开募股。【原文：Genesis Digital Assets is considering an initial public offering in the US, according to people familiar with the matter, as the crypto industry’s resurgence gathers pace.】

item.title: Constellation 高管在资本收益变动前抛售 7500 万美元股票
item.description: 加拿大技术公司 Constellation Software Inc. 6 月份的内线抛售激增，原因是一名高级管理人员在国家提高资本收益税之前抛售了 1.026 亿加元（7500 万美元）的股票。【原文：Canadian technology firm Constellation Software Inc. saw a surge in insider selling in June, driven by a senior executive’s move to unload C$102.6 million ($75 million) of shares ahead of a hike to the nation’s capital-gains tax.】

item.title: 被驱逐出 Tellurian 的液化天然气先驱试图回购股权
item.description: 查里夫-苏基（Charif Souki）说，他计划从投资者那里筹集 1 亿美元，用于购买他共同创办的美国天然气开发公司 Tellurian Inc.【原文：Charif Souki said he plans to raise $100 million from investors to buy a stake in Tellurian Inc., the US natural gas development firm he co-founded and which fired him in December.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团考虑在澳大利亚火灾后出售煤炭资产的方案
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）正在考虑在其澳大利亚旗舰煤矿发生爆炸后出售煤炭业务的方案，包括出售个别资产或将受损业务排除在潜在交易之外的可能性。【原文：Anglo American Plc is considering options to push ahead with a sale of its coal business after an explosion at its flagship Australian mine, including the possibility of selling individual assets or excluding the damaged operation from a potential deal.】

item.title: 新泽西学院要求债券持有人抵押借款
item.description: 骑士大学是新泽西州特伦顿市郊外的一所小型大学，该校正试图筹集更多资金，以解决持续的流动性紧张问题。【原文：Rider University, a small college outside of Trenton, New Jersey, is trying to raise additional funds to help an ongoing liquidity crunch.】

item.title: 企业贷款人正在锁定保护措施，以应对高利率带来的艰难时期
item.description: 高风险、高负债公司的贷款人越来越多地要求保护他们免受融资手段的影响，这些手段被用来在困难时期压低债权人的价格。【原文：Lenders to risky, debt-laden companies are increasingly demanding protection from financing maneuvers used to undercut creditors when times get tough.】

item.title: 巴斯夫在锂市场低迷之际终止在智利的潜在投资
item.description: 德国化工巨头巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）放弃了在智利投资锂矿资产的计划，原因是全球电动汽车应用的放缓拖累了电池金属的价格。【原文：German chemicals giant BASF SE has abandoned plans to invest in lithium mining assets in Chile as a slowdown in electric-vehicle adoption worldwide drags down battery metal prices.】

item.title: 布雷万削减最大基金费用以弥补高昂成本
item.description: 布雷万-霍华德资产管理公司（Brevan Howard Asset Management）削减了其最大基金的费用，以弥补技术、基础设施和人才方面的开支，这些开支导致转嫁成本过高。【原文：Brevan Howard Asset Management cut fees for its biggest fund to make up for technology, infrastructure and talent expenses that pushed pass-through costs too high.】

item.title: 刚果首次出售自己的合资铜矿
item.description: 刚果民主共和国的国有矿业公司首次开始出售其在合资项目中的铜矿份额，因为该国正在寻求加强对这一能源转型关键金属的控制。【原文：The Democratic Republic of Congo’s state miner has started selling its share of copper from joint-venture projects for the first time as the country seeks greater control over a metal key to the energy transition.】

item.title: Marex 表示，可可的极度短缺终于要结束了
item.description: 据大宗商品经纪商马瑞克斯集团（Marex Group）称，世界上最大的可可种植国可可产量的恢复将结束今年可可豆大量短缺导致价格飙升至创纪录水平的局面。【原文：A recovery in cocoa production in the world’s largest growers is set to put an end to a massive bean shortage that sent prices surging to a record this year, according to commodities broker Marex Group.】

item.title: 路透社称欧洲央行行长马克鲁夫认为今年只会再降息一次
item.description: 据路透社报道，欧洲央行管理委员会成员加布里埃尔-马克鲁夫（Gabriel Makhlouf）表示，他对今年再降息一次感到满意，因为他需要更多时间来获得通胀率向2%目标迈进的信心。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Gabriel Makhlouf said he’s comfortable with just one more interest-rate reduction this year as he needs more time to gain confidence inflation is headed to the 2% target, Reuters reported.】

item.title: 法国大选棋局中勒庞的执政之路越走越窄
item.description: 玛丽娜-勒庞领导的国民阵线在组建法国下届政府的道路上正面临着更大的障碍，因为竞争对手采取了一些手段，以减少三方竞选的数量，从而在最后一轮立法选举中有利于她的极右翼政党。【原文：Marine Le Pen’s National Rally is facing a bigger barrier to forming France’s next government after rivals maneuvered to reduce the number of three-way races that would favor her far-right party in the final round of the legislative elections.】

item.title: HPS 投资公司争夺破产 DVD 公司 Redbox 的控制权
item.description: HPS Investment Partners LLC 的律师周二在联邦法院表示，破产的 Redbox Entertainment Inc. 的前负责人不值得信任，他钦点的董事会应该被撤换，因为这家 DVD 租赁公司未能向工人支付工资、为他们的医疗保险提供资金，并挪用了几个月的工资税。【原文：Lawyers for HPS Investment Partners LLC said in federal court Tuesday that the former head of bankrupt Redbox Entertainment Inc. can’t be trusted and his handpicked board of directors should be replaced, after the DVD rental company failed to pay workers, fund their health insurance and diverted months worth of payroll taxes.】

item.title: 英国大选政策指南：各政党在税收和商业方面的承诺
item.description: 保守党、工党、自由民主党和英国改革党的宣言代表了各政党的政策，预计这些政党将在周四的大选中获得约 90% 的选票。所有党派都表示不会增加或削减对劳动人民的税收，承诺结束国民健康服务危机，并致力于为近年来落后于主要竞争对手的经济注入活力。【原文：The manifestos of the Conservatives, Labour, the Liberal Democrats and Reform UK represent the policies of parties that together are expected to receive about 90% of the votes in the general election on Thursday, and they agree on a lot. All say taxes on working people will not increase or will be cut, pledge to end the crisis in the National Health Service and commit to turbocharging an economy that has lagged behind its major peers in recent years.】

item.title: 银行资产负债表堵塞导致关键回购融资利率飙升
item.description: 与金融系统日常借贷需求挂钩的关键利率创下了年初以来的最高水平，原因是国债拍卖结算量巨大，一级交易商资产负债表堵塞，抑制了借贷能力。【原文：A key rate tied to the day-to-day borrowing needs of the financial system hit the highest level since the beginning of the year as chunky Treasury auction settlements and clogged primary dealer balance sheets curbed lending capacity.】

item.title: 以太币 ETF 有望最快于七月中旬获得美国证券交易委员会批准
item.description: 资产管理公司乐观地认为，美国证券交易委员会最快将在 7 月中旬为首批直接投资以太币的美国 ETF 基金开绿灯，并表示与监管机构的来回沟通仍具有建设性。【原文：Asset managers are optimistic that the SEC will greenlight the first US ETFs that invest directly in Ether as soon as mid-July, saying the back and forth with the regulator remains constructive.】

item.title: 艾芬豪公司将新锌矿的产量出售给特拉菲古拉公司和中国中信集团
item.description: 艾芬豪矿业有限公司（Ivanhoe Mines Ltd.）将向特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）和中国中信金属有限公司（Citic Metal Co.【原文：Ivanhoe Mines Ltd. will sell the zinc it produces from a large new mine in the Democratic Republic of Congo to Trafigura Group and China’s Citic Metal Co.】

item.title: 北方数据或将以IPO为单位测试人工智能狂潮的极限
item.description: 德国一家由稳定币巨头 Tether 集团支持的小型加密货币公司正瞄准高目标，准备将其人工智能云计算部门纳入潜在上市计划，这笔交易可能会让股市对人工智能的狂热经受考验。【原文：A small German crypto company backed by stablecoin giant Tether Group is aiming high in a potential listing that includes its artificial intelligence cloud computing unit, in a deal that may put the stock-market frenzy for all things AI to the test.】

item.title: S&P 公司称卡车零部件制造商 Accuride 的违约风险上升
item.description: 据S&P全球评级公司（S&P Global Ratings）称，商用卡车零部件制造商Accuride Corp.公司在采取定价行动和需求低于预期的情况下正在消耗现金，从而提高了明年债务违约或重组的风险。【原文：Commercial-truck parts maker Accuride Corp. is burning cash in the wake of pricing actions and weaker-than-expected demand, raising debt default or restructuring risks within the next year, according to S&P Global Ratings.】

item.title: 拉加德重申欧洲央行在法国大选之际 "关注 "收益率问题
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜-拉加德重申，欧洲中央银行 "关注 "债券市场，同时拒绝对她的祖国法国的选举斗争发表评论。【原文：Christine Lagarde repeated that the European Central Bank is “attentive” to the bond market, while declining to comment on the election fight dominating her home country of France.】

item.title: Wizz Air 预计将在六个月内对进入印度市场的计划作出回应
item.description: Wizz Air Holdings Plc 预计将在未来 6 个月内了解其开通飞往该国航班计划的进展情况，匈牙利低成本航空公司的目标是在这段时间内接收首批可服务于该航线的空客 SE 喷气式飞机。【原文：Wizz Air Holdings Plc expects to find out the status of its plans to start flights to the country in the next six months, around the time that the Hungarian low-cost carrier aims to take delivery of the first Airbus SE jets that can serve the route.】

item.title: 瑞穗聘请前OTPP 高管 Karen Frank 担任欧洲、中东和非洲地区业务高级顾问
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mizuho Financial Group Inc. is hiring former Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan executive Karen Frank as a senior adviser for its Europe, the Middle East and Africa business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说 Robinhood 考虑在美国和欧洲提供加密货币期货
item.description: 据熟悉免佣金投资和交易平台计划的人士透露，Robinhood Markets 公司正考虑在未来几个月内在美国和欧洲推出加密货币期货。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is considering offering cryptocurrency futures in the US and Europe in the coming months, according to people familiar with the commission-free investing and trading platform’s plan.】

item.title: 说唱歌手 Jay-Z 支持奢侈手表平台 Wristcheck
item.description: 嘻哈音乐人肖恩-"Jay-Z"-卡特（Shawn "Jay-Z" Carter）入股奢侈品交易平台 Wristcheck，成为在线手表市场最新的名人支持者。【原文：Hip-hop musician Shawn “Jay-Z” Carter has become the latest celebrity backer of the online watch market after taking an equity stake in luxury trading platform Wristcheck.】

item.title: 阿根廷 15 年来首次将玉米运往中国
item.description: 阿根廷正准备向中国运送玉米，这将是两国 15 年来首次运送玉米，也是两国扩大农产品贸易的最新举措。【原文：Argentina is preparing corn shipments to China that will be the first in 15 years, in the latest move by the two countries to expand agricultural trade.】

item.title: 候选人退休以遏制极右翼势力，法国债券上涨
item.description: 有报道称，在周日的第二轮投票后，各政党正在设法阻止极右翼获得绝对多数，法国债券因此上涨。【原文：French bonds gained amid reports that political parties are maneuvering to block an absolute majority for the far-right after Sunday’s second-round vote.】

item.title: 米莱总统对阿根廷银行股有利有弊
item.description: 由于政府降低利率并限制新的借贷，阿根廷银行业股票在纽约暴跌，这使它们失去了推动利润增长的宽松资金。【原文：Argentine banking stocks in New York are tumbling as the government slashes interest rates and crimps new borrowing, robbing them of the easy money that had been driving profits higher.】
